text: Nabii Ibraahim Yalla inkittoysaamal kay mari kaa giddiyeh isin anu Yalla Qibaadal inkittoysaamah yoo giddiytaanaa? Nummah usuk cakkî fanah tirri yoo heek, anu isin Yallat agleh haytaanaah taqbuden yallittek tu-kalak mameesita, Yi-Rabbi umaanek tuyot Boodisam faxa kaa akke waytek, Yi-Rabbi ixxigah kullim duddu heek isin makaskassowtaanaa qibaada dibuk cakkisittam inki Yalla kinnim taaxigeenimkeh KĶeenik iyye
